author: andreasB6885EP
title: Montcalm is a fantastic hotel and the staf did everything to make our stay wonderful. We will definately return to this
text: The location of the hotel, our room, the breakfast and the service the staf gave us, always with a friendly smile, was superb. We have nothing to wish or complaint about our stay. We will definately recomend this hotel.
